A key change: starting tonight, one long-term home per caregiver. Many were working in multiple homes, thus inadvertently spreading #covid19 to other LTC homes. #covid19ontario #LTC

Premier Ford says despite best efforts "we are dealing with a wildfire in long term care homes"  Says they are quickly turning into the frontline of #covid19.  Says tomorrow will launch enhanced action plan to fight it in LTC, says will redeploy every available resource there now

A requirement for all #OHTs should be that they are responsible for incl all LTC homes in their area.  Each LTC home should also be formally paired with a hospital. Never again will we allow our most vulnerable citizens to be exposed to preventable harm. #COVID19Ontario lessons.
